quote_first: She gave him a strange, subdued smile. “Not so fast, my friend. In theory, yes, it could have been a ship, mimicking a meteriod. But there is the timing point. It had gone by at
quote_last: Central Menaya time and Merral saw his object come in ten minutes earlier at around 6:00 p.m. Eastern Menaya time.”
title: The Shadow and Night
author: Chris Walley

quote_first:

title: Malcom
author: George MacDonald

quote_first: The earpiece crackled and he scrawled down the numbers. Cut the switchboard off and dialed Holly’s pager. Just got a long low tone telling him the pager was switched off. Then he tried the cell phone number. He got an electronic bleep and a recorded message of a woman telling him the phone he was dialing was unreachable. He hung up and looked around the room. It was
title: Die Trying
author: Lee Child

quote_last: A ground-to-ground cruise missile, launched from a tractor installed in the backyard of Leonard Sudavico’s former home by Rashan and a crew of technicians from Afghanistan, exploded onto the Paul Clay estate in the exact spot where the life-size mermaid had once swum in the waterfall.
title: Trouble & Triumph: A Novel of Power & Beauty
author: Tip "T.I." Harris with David Ritz

quote_last: , Saturday afternoon, Nora and Travis and Jim Keene crowded in front of the mattress on which Einstein lay. The dog had just taken a few more ounces of water. He looked at them with interest, too. Travis tried to decide if those large brown eyes still had the strange depth, uncanny alertness, and undoglike awareness that he had seen in them so many times before.
title: Watchers
author: Dean Koontz
